title: Example Document
content:
This is an example of a Figpack Document. It's a good way to give context to figures, group multiple figures together, and prevent figures from expiring. You can control who can view and edit the document.

You can embed Figpack figures in it like this:

<iframe src="https://figures.figpack.org/figures/default/88e3919d7f8ff975a1bc9c21/index.html" width="100%" height="400px"></iframe>

The figure reference is then stored in the database and you get a backlink to the document from the [figure management page](https://manage.figpack.org/figure?figure_url=https://figures.figpack.org/figures/default/88e3919d7f8ff975a1bc9c21/index.html).

Figures that are referenced in a document will not expire.

Here are some more examples of figures embedded in the document:

<iframe src="https://figures.figpack.org/figures/default/58af841cbd0e1b3c4f362b7b/index.html" width="100%" height="400px"></iframe>


A larger example:

<iframe src="https://figures.figpack.org/figures/default/49b633fced04b3d1778ebfaa2eea337215a3f107/index.html" width="100%" height="400px"></iframe>
